about_the_game:
Сreators of RV (Real Virtuality) City introduce to you their new project: RV Kingdom 0x0297.



Story:

Hard times have come upon the continent. While fight for power between factions is reaching its peak, the war seems inevitable. A rumor about the end of times - the demon invasion - starts to spread among people. Will you withstand against the evil or join it?

Features:

One story From 15 Different Visions



Choose one of 15 available classes, ranging from simple merchant to necromancer, all of which have unique gameplay and story!

Mind-Blowing Сutting-Edge Combat System

Huge variety of abilities, status effects, damage types and other features make a complex battle system that can surprise you with its seemingly endless possibilities and quirky situations!

You will take part in many fun battles on 8x8 grid with your own assembled party or solo!

Adventures and Exploration



You will be able to explore a whole continent full of unique cities with different cultures and religions! Each faction has its own philosophy, views on history and goals!

Meet various lively (and not so lively) characters and complete their assignments. Some of them may even join your party!

Wishlist now
If you like the game, the best thing you can do to support us is to add this game to your wishlist. It is a great motivation for our team to keep on working.

short_description: Save the world from the upcoming demon invasion or join the evil forces! Gather a party of gangsters and kick ass! Explore the world within three years and prepare for the great battle that will change the history forever!
